definitions.explanation_en: A colorless, highly corrosive and toxic gas or aqueous solution composed of hydrogen and fluorine; commonly used in industrial processes such as glass etching, petroleum refining, and semiconductor manufacturing.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一种无色、强腐蚀性且有毒的气体或水溶液，由氢和氟组成；常用于玻璃蚀刻、石油精炼和半导体制造等工业过程。
definitions.example_en: Hydrogen fluoride (HF) must be handled with extreme care due to its severe toxicity and ability to penetrate skin.
definitions.example_cn: 由于氟化氢（HF）具有极强的毒性并能穿透皮肤，必须极其谨慎地处理。
